title: Collection, "Design Research Inc. Archive: Marimekko Collection", 1951–79
medium: Correspondence, notes, contracts; brochures, press and promotional pieces (i.e. press releases, mailing cards); trade catalogs, swatches and sample books; photographs; newspaper and magazine clippings (advertisements, articles).
provenance:
Donated by Benjamin and Jane Thompson, 1996.
Note: The Marimekko Collection records were generated during the course of business of Design Research Inc. [D/R].  The records pertain to the relationship between D/R and Marimekko Oy [Finland] and Marimekko Inc. [U.S.A.].  Benjamin Thompson, the founder of the retail establishment Design Research Inc., brought Marimekko to the United States and became the exclusive representative of Marimekko products.
creditline: Gift of  Benjamin and Jane Thompson
description:
The Marimekko Collection records were generated during the course of business of Design Research Inc. [D/R].  The records pertain to the relationship between D/R and Marimekko Oy [Finland] and Marimekko Inc. [U.S.A.].  Benjamin Thompson, the founder of the retail establishment Design Research Inc., brought Marimekko to the United States and became the exclusive representative of Marimekko products.  The records include the development by D/R in bringing Marimekko to the United States market; the relationship with Marimekko's key founder, Armi Ratia; the trade catalogs used for ordering Marimekko products.  The bulk of the collection is trade catalogues and swatch books.

Although the "Marimekko Collection" stands on its own, it should be considered in context with the larger "Design Research Inc. [D/R] Collection" under the "Design Research Archive."

ORGANIZATION OF THE COLLECTION
The Marimekko Collection records are organized into the following seven sections based on the original organization and Box Labels of the creator:

1.  Company History and Background Information
2.  Legal/Copyright / Wholesale Information / Wholesale Correspondence
3.  Marimekko Finland
4.  Scrapbooks and Press
5.  Swatches and Sample Books
6.  Photographs
7.  Misc.
